As a mulberry city, Hachioji's development has given a rich culture.
During the Edo period, merchants built gorgeous festival floats.
During the Meiji period, Hachioji Geigi entertained merchants...
...from all over Japan with their music and dance.
Cultures like these have continued until now.
We still see wonderful floats at the Hachioji Festival.
Mt. Takao is also the place where traditional festivals are held.
In this festival, people walk on fire.
